item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, September 16, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Fair: A Go library for serving resources fairly (99 points | 16 comments)

26. Randomness extractors: making fair coins out of biased coins (90 points | 45 comments)
